name: Noire (RandomCouch, Lynx)
description:
You were born when the universe was young. Back when everything was hot, dense and tasty. So delicious in fact, that you ate so much and fell asleep in a food coma! You have been slumbering, until now, rudely awakened by tiny creatures throwing garbage into you. And now awoken, you've had enough. Time to hand out some black eyes and wrecked holes (metaphorically of course).

Controls:
Move : WASD
Dash: Space (Costs 25% of your mass)

Red lasers deal minor damage
Blue lasers slow you down
Pink lasers deal ultimate damage

Credits:

Developer: RandomCouch
3D Artist: Lynx
SFX Artist: Nemecek
Music: Erebos1349
